thread.section_title: eBid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eBid | www.ebid.net
thread.title: Taking On Water
thread.title_full: eBid reviewed by Taking On Water

author: Taking On Water
title: Taking On Water
text:
Really nice alternative to Ebay and much, much fairer with fees for sellers. I like the functions and it's easy to buy and also list.
I think it genuinely deserves more attention than it gets because a lot of people are still unaware of it. I will be using it a lot more this summer to list my items. I still wish Ebid would advertise more on TV in the UK, it would be great to spread the message.
